General.Name: Panoramic Resources Limited
General.Description: Panoramic Resources Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, evaluation, development of mineral tenements and projects in Australia. It produces and sells nickel, cobalt, and copper. The company holds 100% interests in the Savannah nickel project located in the East Kimberly, Western Australia. Panoramic Resources Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Perth, Australia.
